article_heading: Devastating setback for evacuated Gaza teen after surgery
altText: Shatha Abusalim Smiling mother Shatha stands over her seated daughter, Lamis, who is also smiling, at a school celebration in 2023. The picture is an exterior shot and the pair are infront of a banner with the school's name. There is a cluster of colourful balloons and green foliage.
